amendment.description: To improve Federal contracting and procurement by eliminating fraud and abuse and improving competition in contracting and procurement and by enhancing administration of Federal contracting personnel.

action.text: Amendment SA 4230 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Motion to table amendment SA 4230 made in Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 169.
